title: Plasma Electrolysis Systems (Plasmalyzers®)
description: Traditional hydrogen production is energy-intensive and emits CO₂. Graforce’s Plasmalyzers® solve this by using plasma electrolysis to generate CO₂-free and even CO₂-negative hydrogen from renewable and waste sources, dramatically lowering emissions and energy costs.
